document.full_text: sony suffered a massive breach in its video game online network that led to the theft of names, addresses and possibly credit card data belonging to 77 million user accounts in what is one of the largest-ever internet security break-ins.
document.title: sony playstation suffers massive data breach
lines_and_colors: sony suffered a massive breach in its video game online network that led to the theft of names, addresses and possibly credit card data belonging to 77 million user accounts in what is one of the largest-ever internet security break-ins.
